title: 2 bedroom in quiet neighborhood near BART, AVL 8/1, Fairmount #7
posting_body: Schedule a tour at your convenience here: <URL>
Sunny 2 bed, 1 bath unit at 101 Fairmount Ave.
- Corner unit on third floor (of three floors) in a 10-unit apartment building
- Newly remodel bathroom, and open kitchen with cabinets, granite countertop and granite peninsula.
- Hardwood floors throughout and ample storage space and large closets
- Water and garbage included in the rent
- Private attached one-car parking garage at the rear is included in the rent
- No dog, cats OK with $250 deposit
- Located in a quiet neighborhood close to Lake Merritt and Piedmont Avenue  - Full range shopping convenience with Whole Foods and Trader Joe's nearby, Grocery Outlet is just  around the corner
- 5 minutes walk to Whole Foods, 10 minutes walk to Lake Merritt, and 15 minutes walk to 19th Street  BART station
NOTE: The City of Oakland's Fair Chance Housing Ordinance requires that rental housing providers  display this notice to applicants - <URL> Ordinance.Tenant-Notice.10.5.2020.pdf
